title: Absoluteley Stunning 3 Bedroom 2 Bath Townhouse For Rent!
description: This stunning move in ready End Unit located in the sought-after Gwynedd Walk neighborhood. Featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and 2 half bathrooms, this property offers a beautiful living space with top-notch finishes throughout. As you enter the open concept first floor, you'll immediately notice the gorgeous hardwood flooring and abundance of natural light that floods the space. A gas fireplace creates a warm and inviting atmosphere that can be enjoyed from the family room, kitchen, and dining room. The spacious kitchen is a chef's dream, with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, a gas range, and a large island with ample storage and seating. Upstairs, you'll find a well-appointed master bedroom with a raised ceiling and ceiling fan. The luxurious master en suite features a beautifully tiled and glass surround shower, double vanity with granite countertop, and plenty of space to unwind. Two additional bedrooms are located on the second floor, along with a shared full bath and separate laundry closet for added convenience. The finished basement is an excellent space for entertainment or play, complete with a full egress window and half bath. The light-filled and well-designed space doesn't feel like a lower level at all, and even boasts a feature shiplap wall! Outside, the deck off the family room and kitchen provides a perfect spot for grilling, entertaining, or simply enjoying the fresh air. The two-car attached garage and large mud room offer ample storage and organization space. The landlord pays association fees cover common area maintenance, lawn maintenance, snow removal, and trash service. Don't miss your chance to make this beautiful property your dream home!

title: Large Bi-Level 1 Bedroom in Old City with Exposed Brick
description:
This Bi-Level 1-Bedroom/1-Bathroom Apartment is located in a 19-unit building in the heart of Old City at 3rd and Arch. You will be within walking distance to tons of great restaurants, bars, and shops while also being surrounded by some of Philadelphia's most historic landmarks!
Enter the apartment and immediately fall in love with the hardwood flooring, tall ceilings, and large windows which allow plenty of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly open and bright. The living room is spacious and can accommodate a sectional, coffee table, TV stand, and more! There is an unobstructed sight line into the kitchen which creates an open concept floor plan that everyone loves. There is enough space to accommodate a six-seat dining set as well!
The kitchen has been recently renovated and looks absolutely stunning. It includes dark oak cabinets with brushed nickel hardware, granite countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, electric range, microwave, and dishwasher! There is plenty of storage space throughout the oversized cabinets and there is enough counterspace to prepare any meal you can imagine!
There is an additional wall of cabinets past the kitchen which is the perfect spot for a wet bar! The bedroom is located on the lower level of this bi-level apartment which ensures plenty of privacy when you have guests over. The bedroom is spacious and can accommodate a queen-sized bed with ease! It also includes carpet flooring, a large closet which is perfect for storage and organization, and large windows which allow even more natural light to pour in.
There is also an exposed brick wall which adds the perfect pop of character to the space! The bathroom is luxurious and includes stone tile flooring, a large vanity with plenty of storage, and a full-sized bathtub/shower with an incredible tile surround that extends around the perimeter of the entire bathroom. This bathroom truly feels like having a spa inside your own home!
Photos on this listing are from a vacant unit in this building. Finishes will vary but size and layout are identical. There is a water usage fee of $30.00 due in addition to rent each month. Residents are responsible for electric and cable/internet. Building contains small gym for residents use at no additional cost! Cats and small dogs permitted with $500.00 deposit.
Listing provided by Bay Management Group Philadelphia

title: Welcome to your beautiful, walk-in ready, well maintained home
description: Welcome to your beautiful, walk-in ready, well maintained home designed for easy living nestled in the 55+ Village of Neshaminy Falls Community! This house was totally remodeled in 2020 including the roof, HVAC, hot water heater, windows, carpets and luxury vinyl flooring , kitchen cabinets, refrigerator, stove/oven and dishwasher, and was also painted inside and outside.  To gain entrance to the home, you can use the walkway with maintenance free railings or ramp.  The ramp can be removed if you have no need for it.  Enter through the three season sun room with removable ramp which leads to  the interior door to a large living room and dining room area. Enjoy the comfort of a fabulous island kitchen with white shaker cabinets , granite counter tops, glass backsplash, seating for 2 at the island and a separate eating area that would accommodate a table and chairs.  Stainless Steel Appliances include refrigerator, glass top stove/oven, dishwasher, built-in microwave . The large Primary bedroom has a walk-in closet with plenty of space for your clothes. The Primary bathroom has a walk-in shower, dual vanity with porcelain sinks and linen closet. The second bedroom also has 2 closets, with easy access to the full hall bathroom with tub/shower. This bedroom could also be used as a office. Off of the kitchen is the Laundry room which comes with washer and dryer, and door to access side yard with a storage shed. The side entrance has maintenance-free railings. The Village of Neshaminy Falls Community includes amenities such as Club House with large hall and full kitchen that can be rented for private parties ; game room including pool tables and card tables ; exercise room ; library and brand new outdoor pool. You can conveniently register for trips to destinations such as tropical Cruises to the islands or maybe New England for the changing of the leaves.  Buses pick you up and drop you off at the Clubhouse.  It can't get anymore convenient than that.  You can also have an opportunity for several overnight trips i.e. Niagara Falls or 2 day stay in Cape May, NJ , which could include room, meals and a dinner show. If short day trips interest you, there are excursions to casinos, take in a show at the Sight & Sound Theatre in Lancaster or maybe a River Lady Cruise in Tom's River, NJ. All excursions leave and return directly to the Clubhouse. The Village of Neshaminy Falls is convenient to the PA Turnpike, Route 309, food stores, restaurants, medical facilities, and shopping at the Montgomery Mall. Look no further and enjoy what this home has to offer. See more at: show contact info

description:

title: Available now luxury 2nd Story Loft Apartment with Balcony!
description: Luxury 1 bedroom loft with extra large Balcony, loads of fresh air perfect for grilling. Luxury top of the line brand new apartments available at St. Johns Lofts, located at 1217 N Hancock St, is the renovation and reuse of the Hancock St Johns Church, originally constructed in 1855. Located at the border between two of the fastest growing neighborhoods in Philadelphia, both of which have received national acclaim and attention: Fishtown & Northern Liberties. With a walk score of 96/100 and just steps to transit at Front St, Frankford Ave, Girard Ave, and N 2nd St, this location is ideal for the young professional or empty nester who wants to take full advantage of everything these neighborhoods and the rest of the city have to offer. Within steps of your front door youll discover your new favorite neighborhood bar (Frankford Hall or Johnny Brendas), choose between nationally recognized restaurants (WM Mullherins and Fette Sau), and explore yoga studios (Amrita Yoga), CrossFit gyms (CrossFit Novem), local boutiques (Jinxed), and independent coffee shops (La Colombe and Steep & Grind).St Johns Lofts boasts many beautifully preserved historic architectural details mingled with the complete conversion of the church into 12 amazing new luxury apartments.if you are interested please leave you phone number.

title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.

title: Beautiful 2BR 900sqft UCity apt
description:
4309 Baltimore Ave, Philadelphia PA 19104. 2BR, 1BA, 900sq ft apt, on the 1st floor right across Clark Park within walking distance from UPenn/Drexel! Highlights and rent below.
Highlights: Private backyard, Central Heat and A/C, hardwood floors, dishwasher, very nice and spacious kitchen with a large granite counter-top island. Washer/Dryer is coin-operated and in the basement but that’s okay since the unit is on the 1st floor. Extremely convenient is the 34 and 13 trollies across the street which go straight to campus. The neighborhood is served by the Penn and University City District security guards and is also on the Penn bus/shuttle route. It’s a nice area with many restaurants, coffee shop, and a farmer’s market in Clark park across the street every weekend.
My opinion: I am the current renter and am moving to work in Delaware. For full-disclosure, I am posting to get subletters during the last two months of my rent (June and July) since I am moving late May. So though I’m incentivized to advertise the apt, my liking of the apt is genuine as I of course chose to live here myself. When I was searching for apts, this was a no-brainer because it was the only apt that was 2BR, walking distance to campus, <$1,700/mo, in a nice neighborhood, and actually nice inside (hardwood floors, central heating and A/C, very large spacious kitchen and nice private backyard). We’ve also never seen a mouse in the apartment; landlords for other places will defend mice issues by saying you’ll find that everywhere, but that is not true.
June and July rent: $1650
Rent starting August 1st: $1675
This is available as a sublease from the end of May to the end of July with the option of extending the lease from 8/1/23-7/31/24. If it is a sublease only, the sublease must end on 7/31/23 by 12:00 noon. There is also a $25/month fee for puts – cats are allowed, dogs are not.
If you are interested, please message me a few dates/times in which you are available for a showing, and answer the pre-screening questions below as per the landlord’s request:
1.	What do you do for a living?
2.	What is your income and credit score?
3.	Who will occupy the unit?
4.	Any pets?

title: Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling!
description:
Enjoy Logan Square's convenience and contemporary styling in this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium with a private balcony and parking in Center City. Spanning 1,264 square feet, this lovely sun-splashed condo invites you inside with a gracious tiled foyer lined by three extra-large closets. Ahead, the corner living room provides a generous footprint for seating and dining areas alongside southern and western exposures and a private balcony with iconic skyline views. Chefs will love the windowed eat-in kitchen featuring rows of wood cabinetry, granite counters, a breakfast bar, and a fleet of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave. The desirable split-bedroom layout includes a serene primary suite with a large walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Near the entry, a spacious secondary bedroom offers easy access to the full second bathroom. Three zoned HVAC and an in-unit washer-dryer add comfort and convenience. This rental includes a large storage unit and one assigned parking space. 2201 Cherry Street is a pet-friendly, elevator condominium in the centrally located Logan Square neighborhood, surrounded by the best of Philadelphia living. Enjoy fantastic shopping, dining, nightlife, and entertainment venues in every direction. Visit the city's renowned Parkway Museum District institutions, or amble along the Schuylkill River Trail to Boathouse Row. You'll find Trader Joe's and GIANT nearby, while Penn, Drexel, and Rittenhouse Square are just minutes away. The 22nd Street trolley station, SEPTA Suburban Station, 30th Street Station, and Schuylkill Expressway are all within blocks, providing easy access to the rest of the city and beyond. *Photos are from when the unit was previously staged.
